mapper.select: SELECT a.vedioBeginTime, a.vedioEndTime, a.trainCourseHeadInfoId, a.course, a.trainingFlag, a.courseId, b.videoDurationMinutes, b.videoDurationSeconds, pic.filePath as picAttachUrl FROM ( SELECT tchi.vedioBeginTime AS vedioBeginTime, tchi.vedioEndTime AS vedioEndTime, tchi.id AS trainCourseHeadInfoId, tchi.course AS course, 1 AS trainingFlag, tchi.courseHeadId AS courseId FROM train_course_head_info tchi WHERE tchi.userId = #{userId} AND tchi.deleted = 0 and tchi.vedioEndTime is not null and tchi.vedioEndTime != '' UNION SELECT ic.vedioBeginTime AS vedioBeginTime, ic.vedioEndTime AS vedioEndTime, NULL AS trainCourseHeadInfoId, ic.course AS course, 0 AS trainingFlag, ic.courseHeadId AS courseId FROM introduction_course ic WHERE ic.userId = #{userId} AND ic.deleted = 0 and ic.vedioEndTime is not null and ic.vedioEndTime != '' ) a LEFT JOIN course_head b on b.id = a.courseId and b.deleted =0 and b.releaseFlag=1 LEFT JOIN attach pic on b.picAttachId = pic.id and pic.deleted=0 ORDER BY str_to_date(vedioBeginTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') DESC

SELECT tfh.createDate AS commitTrainTime, tfh.action, tfh.totalSeconds, tfh.actTrainSeconds, tfh.finishSets, tfh.finishCounts, tfh.finishTotalPower as tfhFinishTotalPower, tfh.maxExplosiveness, tfh.avgExplosiveness, tfh.calorie, tfi.actId, tfi.actCountMod, tfi.action, tfi.actSetNum, tfi.actTotalSeconds, tfi.actLastPowerSetting, tfi.actFinishCounts, tfi.actAimCounts, tfi.actAimDuration, tfi.finishTotalPower as tfiFinishTotalPower FROM train_free_head tfh LEFT JOIN train_free_items tfi ON tfh.id = tfi.trainFreeHeadId and tfi.deleted = 0 WHERE tfh.deleted = 0 AND tfh.id = #{trainReportId} ORDER BY (tfi.actSetNum+0) asc

SELECT trainType, trainReportId, trainName, trainTime FROM ( SELECT 1 AS trainType, tchi.id AS trainReportId, tchi.course AS trainName, tchi.vedioEndTime AS trainTime, tchi.actualTrainSeconds AS actualTrainSeconds FROM train_course_head_info tchi WHERE tchi.deleted = 0 AND tchi.userId = #{userId} UNION SELECT 2 AS trainType, tfh.id AS trainReportId, tfh.action AS trainName, tfh.vedioEndTime AS trainTime, tfh.actTrainSeconds AS actualTrainSeconds FROM train_free_head tfh WHERE tfh.deleted = 0 AND tfh.userId = #{userId} ) a ORDER BY str_to_date(trainTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') DESC

SELECT id, createDate AS commitTrainTime, course, totalDurationSeconds, actualTrainSeconds, finishTotalPower, maxExplosiveness, avgExplosiveness, calorie
FROM train_course_head_info WHERE deleted = 0 AND userId = #{userId} AND id = #{trainReportId}

SELECT tcbi.id, tcbi.blockId, tcbi.block, tcbi.blockSetNum, tcbi.sets, ctb.sort FROM train_course_block_info tcbi LEFT JOIN course_trainning_block ctb on tcbi.blockId = ctb.id and ctb.deleted = 0 WHERE tcbi.deleted = 0 AND tcbi.trainCourseHeadInfoId = #{trainCourseHeadInfoId} order by (ctb.sort +0) asc,(tcbi.blockSetNum +0) asc

SELECT tcai.actId, tcai.actCountMod, tcai.action, tcai.actTotalSeconds, tcai.actBasePowerSetting, tcai.actFinishSets, tcai.actAimSets, tcai.actAimDuration, tcai.actTotalPower FROM train_course_act_info tcai where tcai.deleted = 0 and tcai.trainCourseBlockInfoId = #{trainCourseBlockInfoId} order by tcai.sort+0 asc

select min(createDate) beginDate, max(createDate) endDate, (max(id1)-min(id1)+1) consecutiveDays from ( select datediff(createDate,'2019-01-01') id1, (select count(1) from (select date_format(createDate ,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate from (SELECT createDate from train_action_array_head where userId=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT createDate from train_free_head where userId=#{userId} ) a GROUP BY date_format(createDate ,'%Y-%m-%d') ) tr where tr.createDate <= a.createDate ) id2, a.createDate from ( select date_format(createDate ,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate from (SELECT createDate from train_action_array_head where userId=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT createDate from train_free_head where userId=#{userId} ) a GROUP BY date_format(createDate ,'%Y-%m-%d') ) a ) a group by a.id1-a.id2
